item.title: Trump backer John Paulson bows out as possible Treasury secretary pick
item.description: John Paulson said he would remain in involved in implementing economic policies of President-elect Donald Trump

item.title: Boeing delivers fewest planes since 2020, warns factory restart after strike will take weeks
item.description: Boeing handed over 14 airplanes in October and said it will be several weeks before production can fully resume.

item.title: Apple's four-phone strategy is lagging. One idea to reviving sales: Cut the cameras
item.description: Every year since 2020, when Apple moved to a four-model lineup, one of them has lagged in terms of sales.

item.title: One week later â€“ A look at the Trump trades gaining momentum and those that are fading
item.description: Early perceptions of winners among steelmakers and banks are waning, while others like Tesla continue to climb.

item.title: Crypto takes a breather from its postelection rally as bitcoin approaches $90,000
item.description: Bitcoin was trading just shy of $90,000 Monday night after it blasted through the $80,000 level over the weekend.
